movie.title: The Lady
movie.plot: THE LADY is an epic love story about how an extraordinary couple and family sacrifice their happiness at great human cost for a higher cause. This is the story of Aung San Suu Kyi and her husband, Michael Aris. Despite distance, long separations, and a dangerously hostile regime, their love endures until the very end. A story of devotion and human understanding set against a background of political turmoil which continues today. THE LADY also is the story of the peaceful quest of the woman who is at the core of Burma's democracy movement.

events.title: Aung San Suu Kyi wins the Myanmar general election
Aung San Suu Kyi's father, Aung San, is assassinated
Aung San Suu Kyi is awarded the Nobel Peace Prize
